snippet.title: Roulette Dungeon - ANNOUNCEMENT TRAILER
snippet.description:
Wishlist Roulette Dungeon:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3399930/Roulette_Dungeon/

Play the Demo:
https://nicthethicc.itch.io/roulette-dungeon-demo

Roulette Dungeon is a turn-based rogue-like deckbuilder where you spin a roulette wheel to defeat your enemies.
Master the balance between strategic planning and unpredictable luck by placing bets, using special abilities, and collecting items to outsmart your foes and conquer the dungeon.
